staxel.village.dialogue.CutesyPrimary.li: (ì•ˆí•¨)Hello, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! How are you today?
(ì•ˆí•¨)I think it's high time we started considering an expansion of my  ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop;.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Don't you agree?
(ì•ˆí•¨)A few more tools to make things just a liiitle bit easier!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I have some pretty big orders coming up soon after all!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Those should be all I need for now!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Just a liiitle more expansion needed I think...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Then everything will be just perfect!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Fantastic! Of course, I have to make sure you can bake first though!
(ì•ˆí•¨)If you could whip up a nice ^c:1486b0;cheesecake^c:pop; that would be the perfect demonstration!
(ì•ˆí•¨)The key with ^c:1486b0;cheesecakes^c:pop; is knowing exactly getting the cream cheese to room temperature!
(ì•ˆí•¨)You'll get lumps otherwise...
(ì•ˆí•¨)I can't wait to try it!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Oh thank you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! You're a lifesaver!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Thinking about baking extravagant cakes without the extra machines was starting to give me a headache!
(ì•ˆí•¨)To be honest, even thinking about how much work there is to do alone is keeping me awake at night...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Hey...you know what?
(ì•ˆí•¨)How would you like to try being my assistant?
(ì•ˆí•¨)I would love to!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'm a bit neutral on that...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Oh, what a lovely aroma!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Let me take a proper look at your work...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Hmm...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Mmmm~ðŸŽ¶! Exactly spot on!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I could hardly have baked it better myself, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)From today onwards, you're my new assistant!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I hope this will serve as payment for today's work!
(ì•ˆí•¨)We have something pretty big coming up soon, so be sure to keep up with practice!
(ì•ˆí•¨)The time has come, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Our first truly extravagant order! A high profile one too!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Today, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, we prepare for a royal wedding!
(ì•ˆí•¨)The venue is on another island so we can't attend in person, but it's up to us to bake the cake.
(ì•ˆí•¨)A royal wedding... That brings back memories... It will have to be the most perfect cake I've ever baked!
(ì•ˆí•¨)But before all that, we need to start with the samplers!
(ì•ˆí•¨)We're on a tight deadline so I can't make them all myself...
(ì•ˆí•¨)How about you try your hand at the ^c:1486b0;carrot wedding cake^c:pop;?
(ì•ˆí•¨)It's not as hard as it sounds! Start by baking three simple ^c:1486b0;carrot cakes^c:pop; and bring them to me!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Ah~ðŸŽ¶! Three ^c:1486b0;carrot cakes^c:pop;, just like I asked!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Good work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Perfectly prepared!
(ì•ˆí•¨)See these ^c:1486b0;rods^c:pop;? You need to combine them with the three ^c:1486b0;carrot cakes^c:pop;.
(ì•ˆí•¨)That will give you the completed ^c:1486b0;carrot wedding cake^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Baking three simple ^c:1486b0;carrot cakes^c:pop; is where you want to start!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'll be working on the other four samples!
(ì•ˆí•¨)So much work to be done!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Just combine the ^c:1486b0;rods^c:pop; with the three ^c:1486b0;carrot cakes^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Wonderful! That's quite the load off my shoulders!
(ì•ˆí•¨)But...um... I'm not sure how to say this...
(ì•ˆí•¨)We seem to have a little bit of an emergency here...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Apparently the ^c:1486b0;prince^c:pop; himself has shown up on the island to meet the patissier in charge...
(ì•ˆí•¨)That, in this case, would be me...
(ì•ˆí•¨)But how about we pretend it's not? What if you go in my place and entertain him?
(ì•ˆí•¨)I don't really want to be recognised. Besides, I still have a lot of work to do here!
(ì•ˆí•¨)If you put these on, he'll definitely think you're the one in charge!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Hurry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I don't want to risk having him in my ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop;! I don't want to be recognised!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Oh, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)You managed to keep the prince sufficiently entertained then?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Wait...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Are those what I think they are?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Did...did he just give you the ^c:1486b0;wedding rings^c:pop;...?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Wow. I'm speechless.
(ì•ˆí•¨)I knew he was a bit...dense, but this? And he's already left?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Well...
(ì•ˆí•¨)I suppose this isn't your fault so I shouldn't take it out on you!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'll hold onto the ^c:1486b0;rings^c:pop; for now, but here's your payment for today's antics.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Let's hope the actual wedding goes a bit better...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Ah, did you lose your ^c:1486b0;rods^c:pop;? That's not good...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Remember, they go in the cake. Not wherever you put them before...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Did you lose the outfit I gave you?
(ì•ˆí•¨)How on earth did you manage that?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Please try to be more careful with this one...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Hello, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I have some troubling news...
(ì•ˆí•¨)It seems we have a disillusioned ^c:1486b0;princess^c:pop; hiding out in our ^c:1486b0;town hall^c:pop;...
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'd rather not be seen, so maybe you could run on over with the ^c:1486b0;wedding rings^c:pop;?
(ì•ˆí•¨)That might help to calm her down...a little. Maybe.
(ì•ˆí•¨)If she's anything like I remember...probably not.
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'd hurry over with those ^c:1486b0;wedding rings^c:pop;.
(ì•ˆí•¨)I don't even want to imagine what they might be worth!
(ì•ˆí•¨)You'll find the ^c:1486b0;princess^c:pop; hiding out in the ^c:1486b0;town hall^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)So returning the ^c:1486b0;rings^c:pop; wasn't enough to resolve the situation?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Hm. I didn't think so either.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Especially not with how the ^c:1486b0;prince^c:pop; is moping about in the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;...
(ì•ˆí•¨)I have to say, I don't blame her for not wanting to see his face!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'd rather not have to either!
(ì•ˆí•¨)But...perhaps you could go and try to smooth over the situation?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Whatever it is they want you to do, perhaps this time you should come back to me first?
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'd go speak to the ^c:1486b0;prince^c:pop; myself, but I don't really want to see him either...
(ì•ˆí•¨)You'll find him moping about the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Don't forget to take a ^c:1486b0;lemon pie^c:pop; to the ^c:1486b0;princess^c:pop; along with that ^c:1486b0;letter^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Let me know if they give you something else to send...
(ì•ˆí•¨)It's probably best to run it by me first!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'd deliver that ^c:1486b0;letter^c:pop; as quickly as you can!
(ì•ˆí•¨)The wedding is coming up soon!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Ahhh~ðŸŽ¶! That nightmare is finally over!
(ì•ˆí•¨)You can't imagine how stressful that was on top of dealing with their cake...
(ì•ˆí•¨)How did you know what to say?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Oh, that? My brother can be rather...dense at times.
(ì•ˆí•¨)But the ^c:1486b0;princess^c:pop; I also know quite well.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Given all the efforts I made on behalf of their marriage, perhaps I should be the one marrying her!
(ì•ˆí•¨)That's a joke, of course. I wanted to leave the royal life behind.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Being a patissier is far more fulfilling!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Who would have known they'd ask me to bake my cake without even knowing who I was?
(ì•ˆí•¨)Thank you, by the way, for playing the role admirably!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I know this isn't much, but I think you've graduated from the role of assistant!
(ì•ˆí•¨)From now on, we're equals in the baking world! Sort of anyway...this is still my ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop;!
(ì•ˆí•¨)If you ever need a live-in patissier, do let me know though!
(ì•ˆí•¨)I'd be delighted to take up the job!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Is that...a letter? Let me take a look.
(ì•ˆí•¨)Good lord.
(ì•ˆí•¨)What is this garbage? ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop; has written more romantic poetry! About tractors!
(ì•ˆí•¨)Let me just touch that up a bit...
(ì•ˆí•¨)There we go! That should be safe to deliver now!
(ì•ˆí•¨)But...perhaps it would be good to send a ^c:1486b0;lemon pie^c:pop; along with it?
(ì•ˆí•¨)A peace offering of a kind. You know how to make one, right?
(ì•ˆí•¨)It went well, I take it?
(ì•ˆí•¨)And I see you have a reply to deliver...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Ouch. I've seen more heartfelt prose in a law book...
(ì•ˆí•¨)Let me just touch that up again...
(ì•ˆí•¨)I think that should be good to go as is! You won't even need a gift to go along with it!
